.github/workflows/ci.yml

Print this page 
 1 name: Build and test
 2 
 3 on: [push]
 4 
 5 jobs:
 6   linux:
 7     runs-on: 'ubuntu-latest'
 8     steps:
 9     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
10     - name: Build and test
11       run: sh gradlew test --info --stacktrace
12 
13   mac:
14     runs-on: 'macOS-latest'
15     steps:
16     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
17     - name: Install Mercurial
18       run: brew install mercurial
19     - name: Build and test
20       run: sh gradlew test --info --stacktrace
21 
22   win:
23     runs-on: 'windows-latest'

 1 name: Build and test
 2 
 3 on: [push, pull_request]

 6   linux:

 9     - uses: actions/checkout@v1
10     - name: Build and test
11       run: sh gradlew test --info --stacktrace
